mapper.select: select * from (select wic.mobile_no mobileNo,wic.id_code validateCode,wic.date_created updateTime,wic.ksn_no ksnNo,wic.validate_status validateStatus,wic.get_count getCount,wic.validate_count validateCount,wic.status status from ws_identify_code wic order by wic.date_created desc) where rownum <= rownum
